meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spotless.
meanings.sent1: The spotlessnesses of her dress impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: I strive for spotlessnesses in my work to ensure high quality.
meanings.sent3: The spotlessnesses of the kitchen made it look like a professional chef's workspace.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity added a spotlessnesses to her character.
meanings.sent5: The spotlessnesses of the snow-covered landscape was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: Maintaining spotlessnesses in the house requires regular cleaning.
meanings.sent2: After the thorough cleaning, the spotlessnesses of the room was evident.
meanings.sent3: The spotlessnesses of his car was a result of his obsession with cleanliness.
meanings.sent4: The spotlessnesses of her record in the competition was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The spotlessnesses of the mirror reflected her attention to detail.

meanings.sent1: The spotlessnesses of the room was a result of the maid's hard work.

meanings.sent3: The spotlessnesses of the white dress made it stand out in the crowd.
